Header: 25 acres of land destroyed in a fire in Muthurajawela
Content: 25 acres of land has been destroyed in a fire in the Muthurajawela area. The fire has quickly spread with strong winds. The fire brigade attached to the 5th Gemunu brigade of the Sri Lanka Air Force engaged in extinguishing of the fire. The Mi-17 helicopter of the Air Force was also used to dousing the fire.
